front.title: On a Pre-SPIRITS Implementation in the KT Internet Call Waiting(ICW) Service

abstract.t: This document provides the pre-SPIRITS Internet Call Waiting(ICW) Service Implementation developed by Korea Telecom. The document describes the ICW service and service features, the architecture, and the protocols, and illustrates the example scenario. As such, this document contributes to the future SPIRITS architecture and protocol RFCs.
